p:
There were a few exceptions to this conservative endemic rule; e.g., many types of H5N1 chicken viruses were detected in East Asia (Fig. 4). Viruses might be carried by imported livestock. Such migration has also been reported for viruses from swine that were transported from Europe to Mexico
11, 12 . The group U swine viruses were further separated into European and Asian subgroups and one of the European viruses was found in Mexico (Fig. S4B; U, PC1, indicated as “2”).
